member.name: MIB_UDPSTATS2
member.summary: TheMIB_UDPSTATS2 structure contains statistics for the User Datagram Protocol (UDP) running on the local computer. This structure is different from structure in that it uses 64-bit counters, rather than 32-bit counters.

member.name: MIB_UDPSTATS2.dwNoPorts
member.summary: The number of datagrams received that were discarded because the port specified was invalid.

member.name: MIB_UDPSTATS2.dwInErrors
member.summary: The number of erroneous datagrams received. This number does not include the value contained by the dwNoPorts member.

member.name: MIB_UDPSTATS2.dwNumAddrs
member.summary: The number of entries in the UDP listener table.
